headline: Tomorrow's Stars on Stage Today at Simon® Malls
summary: Simon® teams up with music industry luminaries Randy Jackson and Paula Moore to bring music industry access and emerging artists to perform at Simon malls across the U.S.INDIANAPOLIS, Jan. 29, 2025...

headline: Simon® to Bring New Premium Outlets® to Metro Nashville
summary: Construction expected to begin in 2026; Nashville Premium Outlets will become Simon's third investment in the area INDIANAPOLIS, Jan. 29, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Simon®, a real estate investment trust...
